enum  FlagShift {
  kAntiAlias_Shift, kLinearText_Shift, kUnderlineText_Shift, kStrikeThruText_Shift,
  kFakeBoldText_Shift, kFlagShiftCount
}
enum  FlagMask {
  kAntiAlias_Mask = 1 << kAntiAlias_Shift, kLinearText_Mask = 1 << kLinearText_Shift, kUnderlineText_Mask = 1 << kUnderlineText_Shift, kStrikeThruText_Mask = 1 << kStrikeThruText_Shift,
  kFakeBoldText_Mask = 1 << kFakeBoldText_Shift, kAllFlagMasks = (1 << kFlagShiftCount) - 1
}
enum  Style { kFill_Style, kStroke_Style, kStrokeAndFill_Style, kStyleCount }

  kButt_Cap, kRound_Cap, kSquare_Cap, kCapCount,
  kDefault_Cap = kButt_Cap
}
enum  Join {
  kMiter_Join, kRound_Join, kBevel_Join, kJoinCount,
  kDefault_Join = kMiter_Join
}
enum  FilterType { kNo_FilterType, kBilinear_FilterType, kFilterTypeCount }

Detailed Description

The SkPaint class holds the style and color information about how to draw geometries, text and bitmaps.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum SkPaint::Cap
 

Enumeration values:
kButt_Cap  begin and end a contour with no extension
kRound_Cap  begin and end a contour with a semi-circle extension
kSquare_Cap  begin and end a contour with a half square extension

enum SkPaint::FilterType
 

Enumeration values:
kNo_FilterType  draw bitmaps using nearest-neighbor sampling
kBilinear_FilterType  draw bitmaps using bilinear sampling

enum SkPaint::FlagMask
 

Enumeration values:
kAntiAlias_Mask  bit mask for the flag enabling antialiasing
kLinearText_Mask  bit mask for the flag enabling linear-text (no gridding)
kUnderlineText_Mask  bit mask for the flag enabling underline text
kStrikeThruText_Mask  bit mask for the flag enabling strike-thru text
kFakeBoldText_Mask  bit mask for the flag enabling fake-bold text

enum SkPaint::FlagShift
 

Enumeration values:
kAntiAlias_Shift  bit position for the flag enabling antialiasing
kLinearText_Shift  bit position for the flag enabling linear-text (no gridding)
kUnderlineText_Shift  bit position for the flag enabling underline text
kStrikeThruText_Shift  bit position for the flag enabling strike-thru text
kFakeBoldText_Shift  bit position for the flag enabling fake-bold text

enum SkPaint::Join
 

Enumeration values:
kMiter_Join  connect path segments with a sharp join (respects miter-limit)
kRound_Join  connect path segments with a round join
kBevel_Join  connect path segments with a flat bevel join

enum SkPaint::Style
 

Styles apply to rect, oval, path, and text. Bitmaps are always drawn in "fill", and lines are always drawn in "stroke"

Enumeration values:
kFill_Style  fill with the paint's color
kStroke_Style  stroke with the paint's color
kStrokeAndFill_Style  fill and stroke with the paint's color

Member Function Documentation

SkScalar SkPaint::ascent (   )  const
 

In java we cannot use these parameters to pass back the ascent and descent, so I'm creating new functions to return them. These should be edited by the tool so I can use them in java

U8 SkPaint::getAlpha (   )  const [inline]
 

Helper to getColor() that just returns the color's alpha value.

SkColor SkPaint::getColor (   )  const [inline]
 

Return the paint's color. Note that the color is a 32bit value containing alpha as well as r,g,b. This 32bit value is not premultiplied, meaning that its alpha can be any value, regardless of the values of r,g,b.

FilterType SkPaint::getFilterType (   )  const [inline]
 

Return the paint's bitmap filter type. This setting affects drawBitmap() and bitmaps that appear inside a bitmap shader.

SkMaskFilter* SkPaint::getMaskFilter (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns:
the paint's maskfilter (nor nil) without affecting the maskfilter's reference count

SkPathEffect* SkPaint::getPathEffect (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns:
the paint's patheffect (nor nil) without affecting the patheffect's reference count

SkShader* SkPaint::getShader (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns:
the paint's shader (nor nil) without affecting the shader's reference count

Cap SkPaint::getStrokeCap (   )  const [inline]
 

Return the paint's stroke cap type.

Join SkPaint::getStrokeJoin (   )  const [inline]
 

Return the paint's stroke join type.

SkScalar SkPaint::getStrokeMiter (   )  const [inline]
 

Return the paint's stroke miter value. This is used to control the behavior of miter joins when the joins angle is sharp.

SkScalar SkPaint::getStrokeWidth (   )  const [inline]
 

Return the width for framing. 0 indicates framing in hairline mode, which always draws a single pixel independent of the current matrix.

Style SkPaint::getStyle (   )  const [inline]
 

Return the paint's style, used for controlling how primitives' geometries are interpreted (except for drawBitmap, which always assumes kFill_Style).

void SkPaint::getText16Path (  const U16  text[],
size_t  numberOf16BitValues,
SkScalar  x,
SkScalar  y,
SkPath *  path
)  const
 

Return the path (outline) for the specified text. Note: just like SkCanvas::drawText, this will respect the Align setting in the paint.

Align SkPaint::getTextAlign (   )  const [inline]
 

Return the paint's text alignment.

void SkPaint::getTextPath (  const char  text[],
size_t  length,
SkScalar  x,
SkScalar  y,
SkPath *  path
)  const
 

Return the path (outline) for the specified text. Note: just like SkCanvas::drawText, this will respect the Align setting in the paint.

SkScalar SkPaint::getTextScaleX (   )  const [inline]
 

Return the paint's horizontal scale factor for text. The default value is 1.0.

SkScalar SkPaint::getTextSize (   )  const [inline]
 

Return the paint's text size.

SkScalar SkPaint::getTextSkewX (   )  const [inline]
 

Return the paint's horizontal skew factor for text. The default value is 0.

SkScalar SkPaint::getTextTracking (   )  const [inline]
 

Return the paint's text tracking value. The defautl value is 0. This value is used to add/subtract space between characters in a line of text.

SkTypeface* SkPaint::getTypeface (   )  const [inline]
 

Return the paint's typeface object (or nil for the default font). This object identifies which font to use when drawing or measuring text. If a previous maskfilter exists, its reference count is decremented. If maskfilter is non-nil, its reference count is incremented.

SkXfermode* SkPaint::getXfermode (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns:
the paint's xfermode (nor nil) without affecting the xfermode's reference count

bool SkPaint::isAntiAliasOn (   )  const [inline]
 

Helper for getFlags(), returning true if kAntiAlias_Mask bit is set

SkScalar SkPaint::measureText (  const char  text[],
size_t  length
)  const [inline]
 

Return the width of the utf8 text.

SkScalar SkPaint::measureText (  const char  utf8[],
size_t  length,
SkScalar *  above,
SkScalar *  below
)  const
 

Return the width of the utf8 text.

Parameters:
utf8 Address of the utf8 text
length Number of bytes of utf8 text to measure
above If not nil, returns the distance above the baseline (ascent)
below If not nil, returns the distance below the baseline (descent)
Returns:
The width of the utf8 text

SkScalar SkPaint::measureText16 (  const U16  utf16[],
size_t  numberOf16BitValues,
SkScalar *  above,
SkScalar *  below
)  const
 

Return the width of the utf16 text.

Parameters:
utf16 Address of the utf16 text
numberOf16BitValues Number of 16bit values to measure
above If not nil, returns the distance above the baseline (ascent)
below If not nil, returns the distance below the baseline (descent)
Returns:
The width of the text

void SkPaint::reset (   ) 
 

Restores the paint to its initial settings.

void SkPaint::setAlpha (  U8CPU  a  ) 
 

Helper to setColor(), that only assigns the color's alpha value, leaving its r,g,b values unchanged.

void SkPaint::setAntiAliasOn (  bool   ) 
 

Helper for setFlags(), setting or clearing the kAntiAlias_Mask bit

void SkPaint::setARGB (  U8CPU  a,
U8CPU  r,
U8CPU  g,
U8CPU  b
) 
 

Helper to setColor(), that takes a,r,g,b and constructs the color value using SkColorSetARGB()

void SkPaint::setColor (  SkColor   ) 
 

Set the paint's color. Note that the color is a 32bit value containing alpha as well as r,g,b. This 32bit value is not premultiplied, meaning that its alpha can be any value, regardless of the values of r,g,b.

void SkPaint::setFakeBoldTextOn (  bool   ) 
 

Helper for setFlags(), setting or clearing the kStrikeThruText_Mask bit

void SkPaint::setFilterType (  FilterType   ) 
 

Set the paint's bitmap filter type. This setting affects drawBitmap() and bitmaps that appear inside a bitmap shader.

void SkPaint::setLinearTextOn (  bool   ) 
 

Helper for setFlags(), setting or clearing the kLinearText_Mask bit

SkMaskFilter* SkPaint::setMaskFilter (  SkMaskFilter *  maskfilter  ) 
 

Set a maskfilter object into the SkPaint, or nil to clear any previous maskfilter. If a previous maskfilter exists, its reference count is decremented. If maskfilter is non-nil, its reference count is incremented.

Parameters:
maskfilter the new filter (or nil) to be installed into the paint
Returns:
its parameter (maskfilter)

SkPathEffect* SkPaint::setPathEffect (  SkPathEffect *  effect  ) 
 

Set a patheffect object into the SkPaint, or nil to clear any previous patheffect. If a previous patheffect exists, its reference count is decremented. If patheffect is non-nil, its reference count is incremented.

Parameters:
effect the new path effect (or nil) to be installed in the paint
Returns:
its parameter (effect)

SkShader* SkPaint::setShader (  SkShader *  shader  ) 
 

Set a shader object into the SkPaint, or nil to clear any previous shader. If a previous shader exists, its reference count is decremented. If shader is non-nil, its reference count is incremented.

Parameters:
shader the new shader (or nil) to be installed in the paint
Returns:
its parameter (shader)

void SkPaint::setStrikeThruTextOn (  bool   ) 
 

Helper for setFlags(), setting or clearing the kStrikeThruText_Mask bit

void SkPaint::setStrokeCap (  Cap   ) 
 

Set the paint's stroke cap type.

void SkPaint::setStrokeJoin (  Join   ) 
 

Set the paint's stroke join type.

void SkPaint::setStrokeMiter (  SkScalar   ) 
 

Set the paint's stroke miter value. This is used to control the behavior of miter joins when the joins angle is sharp. This value must be >= 0.

void SkPaint::setStrokeWidth (  SkScalar   ) 
 

Set the width for framing. 0 indicates framing in hairline mode, which always draws a single pixel independent of the current matrix. This value must be >= 0.

void SkPaint::setStyle (  Style   ) 
 

Set the paint's style, used for controlling how primitives' geometries are interpreted (except for drawBitmap, which always assumes kFill_Style).

void SkPaint::setTextAlign (  Align   ) 
 

Set the paint's text alignment.

void SkPaint::setTextScaleX (  SkScalar  scaleX  ) 
 

Set the paint's horizontal scale factor for text. The default value is 1.0. Values > 1.0 will stretch the text wider. Values < 1.0 will stretch the text narrower.

void SkPaint::setTextSize (  SkScalar   ) 
 

Set the paint's text size. This value must be > 0

void SkPaint::setTextSkewX (  SkScalar  skewX  ) 
 

Set the paint's horizontal skew factor for text. The default value is 0. For approximating oblique text, use values around -0.25

void SkPaint::setTextTracking (  SkScalar  tracking  ) 
 

Return the paint's text tracking value. The defautl value is 0. This value is used to add/subtract space between characters in a line of text.

SkTypeface* SkPaint::setTypeface (  SkTypeface *  typeface  ) 
 

Set the paint's typeface object (or nil for the default font). This object identifies which font to use when drawing or measuring text. If a previous typeface exists, its reference count is decremented. If typeface is non-nil, its reference count is incremented.

void SkPaint::setUnderlineTextOn (  bool   ) 
 

Helper for setFlags(), setting or clearing the kUnderlineText_Mask bit

SkXfermode* SkPaint::setXfermode (  SkXfermode *  xfermode  ) 
 

Set a xfermode object into the SkPaint, or nil to clear any previous xfermode. If a previous xfermode exists, its reference count is decremented. If xfermode is non-nil, its reference count is incremented.

Parameters:
xfermode the new xfermode (or nil) to be installed in the paint
Returns:
its parameter (xfermode)
